application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Work to Western Red Cedar covered by LBE ORDER NO 100 (1980) - T1 - Fell and replace elsewhere in the garden.
decision_conditions: The Council does not consider that the grounds specified by the applicant/agent (i.e. size of the tree/location of the tree) sufficient reason to justify the proposed removal of a mature and prominent tree of significant amenity that makes a positive contribution to the amenity of the locality and wider borough.

The Council does not consider that the grounds specified by the applicant/agent (i.e. alleged damage to property) sufficient reason without substantiating evidence, to justify the proposed removal of a mature and prominent tree of significant amenity that makes a positive contribution to the amenity of the locality and wider borough.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: LHA Maximum Height Level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet).
LLA Maximum height level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet)
